meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny, folks! It's your boy, back with another review that's guaranteed to make you laugh, cry (maybe), and most importantly, play some awesome games!

Now, let's get to the meat of the matter. Today, I'm reviewing Double Fine's Trenched, a game that combines tower defense with third-person mech shooter elements. That's right; it's like someone took all my favorite childhood memories and mashed them together into one glorious mess.

So, what's the verdict? Well, let me tell you - these critics got it right! Xbox World Australia calls it "so much more" than just a tower-defense game (92). Worth Playing agrees, saying it's one of the best downloadable titles this year (90). SpazioGames thinks it's perfect for fans of both genres (85), and Gaming Nexus claims it's one of the most creative games of the year (83).

Now, I'm not going to lie; some critics were a bit more...critical. XboxAddict says you have to "get past" some limitations (80), while The A.V. Club finds it to be just "accessible fun" (75). And, sadly, games(TM) thinks it's missing that special Double Fine sauce (70).

But don't worry; I'm not here to give you a run-down of the critics' scores or try to sway your opinion with fancy stats and charts (although, let's be real, those things are fun too). Nope - I'm here to tell you what you need to know: Trenched is a blast! It's like someone took all my favorite childhood memories, mashed them together into one glorious mess, and then gave me a mech suit to stomp around in.

And hey, if you don't believe me, just check out some of these quotes:

* "At the most basic of explanations, it's a tower-defense game crossed with a third-person mech shooter." (Xbox World Australia) - Yeah, that sounds about right!
* "The mix of genres works out just right..." (Worth Playing) - Same here, folks!
* "Whether if you're a fan of the Tower Defense genre or the Action genre... it's a title not to be missed." (SpazioGames) - You heard it here first!

So, what are you waiting for? Get Trenched and join the fun!
